title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Great Fruit Debate w/ Mina Kimes
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - The Great Fruit Debate w/ Mina Kimes
description:
The guys discuss everything connected to the Draymond Green-Jordan Poole incident and how everyone can proceed from here. Then they talk about Stephen A. Smith’s tweet, Brian Robinson’s bounce back, and Russell Wilson being the worst before welcoming on Mina Kimes to have an in depth debate about fruit. #Volume #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
